title: Under the Cherry Blossom
summary: A VR content interacting with cherry blossom petals by creating a flow of air through mid-air hand gestures.

paragraph: A VR content interacting with cherry blossom petals by creating a flow of air through mid-air hand gestures.
The course project from [Interactive Universe Design - Spring 2022, instructor: Prof. Seokhyung Bae]
